attributes.action: Ask for the resignation of David Cameron, for his failings to the public.
attributes.additional_details:
David Cameron has broken multiple promises he has made to the public that he was elected as PM to do. Here are links to multiple sources and media outlets relating to MR Cameron's failings to the British public...

https://www.google.co.uk/webhp?sourceid=chrome-instant&ion=1&espv=2&ie=UTF-8#q=broken%20promises%20made%20by%20david%20cameron
attributes.background: We the people feel it is time Mr Cameron stepped down from office and be replaced with someone who is willing to do what they are elected to, something Mr Cameron has failed repeatedly during his time as PM.

rejection.details:
The resignation of an individual Minister is not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or Parliament, you could start a petition about that.
